resources.string: I make up with my girlfriend.

string-array.name: arr_on_touch
string-array.item: There is a book on the desk.
There\'s a fly on the ceiling.
There is a handle on the door.
He has a scar on his face.
A baby is on the back.
I\'m on the computer.
He is singing on the piano.

string-array.name: arr_on_ing
string-array.item: She talked on and on.
They moved forward on and on.
From now on, I will learn Chinese.
I\'m skipping breakfast from now on.
I can\'t move on anymore.
How long are you going to stay on here?
His speech dragged on for an hour.
I want you to get on with him.
Stop chatting and get on with your work!

string-array.name: arr_up_whole
string-array.item: We went up to the hill slowly.
I went up to him and asked.
We walked up to the hill.
We ran up to the hill.
We drove to the hill.
A strange man walked up to me.
A strange man ran up to me.
A strange man drove up to me.
Plants come up in spring.
Come up to the second floor.
Somebody came up to me.
Come up and solve the problem.
The decision up to you.
It is up to you to go or not.
The choice is all up to you.
I\'ll call you up in ten minutes.
Ring me up as soon as you get here.
The child is growing up well.
She grew up to be an able artist.
Please pull up your shirt. I\'ll check your chest.
Pull up the chairs, here.
Please pull up in front of the bank.
Draw up here please.
I\'m studying English very hard to move up to the advanced class.
You need to speak fluent English to move up.
It is a hard work to bring up the children.
Why don\'t you bring up your idea during the next meeting?
He brought up lunch.
I looked up to the sky for a while.
I look up to my parents.
If you don\'t know the word, look it up in a dictionary.
You should look up what you need on the computer.
Everybody, please pick up your glasses.
Pick up the phone, it\'s for you.
Let me pick up the bill.
Please pick up some fruites on your way home.
I\'m here to pick up my pants.
Where can I pick up my baggage?
I\'ll pick you up and take you to the airport.
I picked up a few words of Japanese when I was in Tokyo.
